title: The Chromaticist of Whispering Glade
synopsis: Kaelen, a master woodcarver living in a world of grey, takes on an unexpected apprentice who can see the colors he has lost. When the world begins to fade into silence, they set out to find the source of the Bleed and confront the Chromaticist behind it, learning that creation and harmony can be stronger than control.
author: PagePortals
